column1: 6160,Marvel Adventures the Avengers (2006) #11,11,7067,180,"Are you an ambitious self-starter? Can you sneak genetically altered snakes with mind-control venom into friend's clothes? Do you think you have the power to take on a super-team like The Avengers?  Then you might have what it takes to be one of the SONS OF THE SERPENT (offer not limited to males)!,2007,3
